title: Natural Born Witch
description: They looked like the perfect family. Perfect couple with their perfect kids. Perfect darkness lurking within.   Day One of her new job and psychic witch Charlie Payne is already in danger. When she and her team are called in to investigate the disappearance of the Cochran family from their home it looks like a straightforward demon abduction. Only there's never anything straightforward about dealing with a demon and Charlie knows it. How did such a nice family end up with a house covered in demon dust? And what did the demon do with them? Add to that a new partner she's not sure she trusts, a teenage son itching to dive into the family business, an old partner who isn't quite ready to let her go, and an argument with her cousins and Charlie has her hands full.  Dealing with a demon might just be the easiest part of her day. Dealing with her family is a whole other matter.  Natural Born Witch is the eighth book in the Witches of Palmetto Point series. If you like books filled with supernatural suspense that includes, ghosts, reapers, demons, psychics, and witches then you'll love this series. Pick up your copy today and buckle into this addictive ride, because once you start reading you won't put it down.
author: Wendy Wang
